landmarks.name: Castillo San Felipe del Morro
landmarks.description: 16th-century fortress guarding the entrance to San Juan Bay.

landmarks.name: San Juan Cathedral
landmarks.description: One of the oldest cathedrals in the Americas.

landmarks.name: La Fortaleza
landmarks.description: Historic governor residence and UNESCO World Heritage Site.

landmarks.name: Puerta de San Juan
landmarks.description: Original city gate that connected the old city to the harbor.

landmarks.name: Paseo de la Princesa
landmarks.description: Historic waterfront promenade along San Juan Bay.
